10
11#include "rtc_base/message_handler.h"
12
13#include "rtc_base/thread.h"
14
15namespace rtc {
16
17MessageHandlerAutoCleanup::MessageHandlerAutoCleanup() {}
18
19MessageHandlerAutoCleanup::~MessageHandlerAutoCleanup() {
20 // Note that even though this clears currently pending messages for the
21 // message handler, it's still racy since it doesn't prevent threads that
22 // might be in the process of posting new messages with would-be dangling
23 // pointers.
24 // This is related to the design of Message having a raw pointer.
25 // We could consider whether it would be safer to require message handlers
26 // to be reference counted (as some are).
27 ThreadManager::Clear(this);
28}
29
30} // namespace rtc
31
